closure_type.description: The type of fastener used to keep an item closed and to facilitate putting on the item.
Velcro, Snap, Loop, Hook & Loop, Button, Hook & Eye, Snap Hook, Tie, Clasp, Zipper, Flap, Button Fashioned, Snap-Fastened, Pin, Snap-in, Hook, Toggle, String.
